reviews.text:
Like the outdoor seats. Air conditioned and “peaceful”.

Food standards are maintained. The sauce are so good! Like their lemongrass tea.

Servers are friendly and trying their best.

I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional service I received from Ms. Amira. Despite being close to closing time, she still took my order with a smile and entertained me with outstanding manners. The meal was absolutely delicious, and I left with a happy and full stomach. Please pass along my gratitude for a job well done!

Scrumptious food, inviting atmosphere, as well as excellent prompt and attentive service with a cheerful smile by Amira who also shared useful information about the membership program. My family had a very enjoyable dining experience!

Adequate/big portions of food that are all very tasty. The pho soup is the best here, with a savoury broth, soft slices of beef and tender beef balls ($11.90). Seems too little sliced beef though. I also ordered the stir fried basil chicken with rice and it was delicious, except a weird mix of mint in it which was not the best pairing (~$11.50). Atmosphere was great, no crowd, peaceful and clean. Staff were so friendly.

The softshell crab rolls were quite delicious but thought the dipping sauce could have been more authentic. Chicken chop pho was average and I should have asked to plate the chicken chop separately. Service was good as long as they didn't chase us out after we had finished the food.
